trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around December 8th 2012
Summary: large bright blue half circle setting behind apt complexes 3 secs then disappeared no sound. no electrical wires in that area.
divs: Sighting Detailswhile unloading gifts form the car we saw a large bright light setting behind the complexes it was the lenghts of the complexes a bright light blue had a steady glow for 3 secs then disappeared the sky was clear and there are no electrical high wires in that area. we all stared at each other in amazement and wonder, we all confirmed the light and questioned exactly what was seen.
